With the exception of my own mistake of ordering Emerald instead of the Turquoise that I thought I had selected (oops!) they are great. Adjustable length is perfect. We ordered two and they serve their purpose just as expected.

Very nice dog collar but a little rough on the neck of my Chiweenie.  She has very fine hair around her neck and it is very delicate so most dog collars seem to irritate her.  Still trying to find a good lightweight collar.  The Lime Green color really stood out on her tan colored hair when she was able to wear it.  Her neck is 11" and this collar fit perfectly with room to grow.

The collar came and was the correct size, color, and the personalization was correct.  The dark thread on the pink collar quickly faded in the sunlight within a month, but is still legible.  Despite my dog chewing on the collar, it has held up and the buckles still work. I have used the collar on my dog for a few months, and would recommend it at this price.

These treats are great because you can tear them into tiny pieces without them crumbling all over the place. We have a 10 week old Maltese who is only 2.5 lbs, so an entire treat is too big- he would get full just from training!  Other treats we’ve tried just crumble when you try to pinch off just a small piece, but these are great for that. Plus, he loves the smell and taste of these. A+

I have an incredibly picky dog. 7 months old and this pup has doesn't even eat his own Wellness Kibble but these soft bites, he loves and eats every time. It's very healthy and you can even break them up into smaller pieces for training. It's grain-free for allergies and it doesn't expire until a year since purchase. My puppy also has a bit of a sensitive stomach but nothing bad has been happening for a month now.

I really wanted to like this product from all the good reviews that it had but it made my puppy sick. I broke/ripped the treats into 4 little squares and used them as my 3 month old puppy's training treats. I gave her no more than 3 full sized treats a day, yet it still made her sick and she had diarrhea for the following 2 days straight. It might've just been my puppy's tummy not reacting well to the treats, but I definitely wouldn't risk it and try these again...

Wellness made another similar product but that one is unavailable.  Perhaps this is the replacement.  There is a Wellness crunchy snack available but it has cherry and spearmint flavors. My incredibly fussy Cockapoo likes these but I held my breath because he won't eat most dog snacks (like Milk Bone).  So, he is happy and so am I.

review_title: So Good My Puppy Ate The Whole Bag.
review_body: My puppy loves these treats and I will definitely buy them again for training. The only down side is they are so delicious after I gave my puppy a few she found a way to get them off the living room table(I'm guessing she climbed on it...?) and ate the whole bag. XD Hopefully I can try training with the next bag.

review_title: Smells so good for puppies and great for training can be broken into smaller size
review_body: My puppy goes crazy for these treats the smell is so strong and pleasing for him that it’s awesome to use as training treats it’s soft enough to break in half and when he was on antibiotics it was perfect for hiding his tablet as it’s soft enough to mold it.

I use these to train my puppy, rewarding her when she potties outside.  At first she didn't seem to like them, but now thinks they are pretty good.  They are soft so I can break one in two pieces if I want to.  Being that they are grain free is a plus.

review_title: Good texture and easy to break up for smaller dogs!
review_body: My puppy doesn't show ANY interest in these lamb/salmon flavored treats. I wish she did though because she is 3 lbs and these are super easy to break up to the appropriate size for her

review_title: MADE IN USA and Puppy Approved!
review_body: My little Shih Tzu Lola is 9 months old and absolutely loves these treats! I had been working on getting her to stand and walk to me but she wasn't very motivated, until I got these. Now I can get her to do mostly everything. She even does tricks without commands because she is so excited. These are 'smelly' but in a good way, it makes them enticing to your puppy. I love that they are soft enough to break into pieces. I usually break them into quarters and give her 2-3 treats. I LOVE that they are MADE IN USA, as I refuse to give her treats made in China. I also like that these treats have no wheat, corn, soy, meat by-product, dairy, or artificial colors or flavors! I think these are really great and really wish I had discovered them earlier. I'm very picky about what I give my little girl. Before these treats she was only allowed to have nibbles of fresh apple or cooked sweet potato, sometimes some smooshed banana with probiotics (for her tummy), and tiny licks of peanut butter. Training is so much easier now!

These are the only treats my husky will eat. Others don't interest her and some have left her with loose stool. Excellent quality and always have a fresh smell to them. I have bought treats that smelled awful! Wellness brand has always met my expectations and it's the brand I use to feed my dogs.

This is my second purchase in many years... the collar is such a good product, I finally ordered a second just to get a new color! I’ve washed my prior one and been pleased with results. It’s easy to put on and to release.

review_title: Will Buy Again When The Time Comes!
review_body: I find this collar to be cute but simple (love all the collar options,) durable and fits comfortable around my pup. I use only to hold my dogs tags on but do not walk her/attach her leash to it as she has a harness. If one were to walk their dog on the collar, the clip to shut feature seems to be very strong so one shouldn’t have to worry about it coming unclipped as they are walking their dog.

Bought this for my Corgi/Lab mix after his first collar, purchased at a big box pet store, got stretched out enough for him to slip out of it.  Had this one for a several months now with no stretching issues!

Really well made dog collar.  Sizing was correct for my small dog, clasp was easy to latch/unlatch unlike some that take super strength.  Highly recommended- a quality item with a very reasonable price!

review_title: Good collar for hard to find size
review_body: After much searching for a 10 inch diameter collar I luckily found this. Seems most manufacturers skip the 8 to 10 inch range. Not as wide as I would of like ,since my dogs strong for her size , for walking use. Otherwise made well.

review_title: There's no right size for my toy poodle
review_body: I have a toy poodle who weighs about 7lbs. I first bought their small collar but it was too big and the rubber blueberry logo stopped me from making it smaller. I carefully removed the rubber and was able to make the collar smaller but it still was too big on my dog still.  I then bought the xsmall and it's too small for him! He just got groomed so he has little hair around his neck and I've extended the collar as far as it can go and it just barely fits him. At least I didn't have to remove the blueberry logo so I can at least consider returning this item.  I probably will end up keeping it though as I'm too lazy to go through returning.  The collar extended all the way fits him but I'm going to have to keep doing the 2 finger check as his fur grows back to make sure it's not getting too snug.

Great quality collar. Easy to adjust, and holds its position. Most of all the inside isn’t harsh on my dogs skin. Most collars I’ve purchased have sharp glue inside that hurts my dog. This one is soft even at the stitched side which is hard to find. Will definitely purchase bigger size when needed.

These colors, imho, are THE best dog collars. I have bought 3 for my dogs. I was so impressed with the first one, I bought 2 more! They're made to last. They're a quality product. I would definitely recommend these to any and dog lover.

These little collars are great for our little doxies. We have three and each girl has her own color to make them easier to tell apart. They have stood up well to time (we bought them last year) and wash up nicely after a romp in the pond.
Got a Medium for my Cocker Spaniel who is a medium sized dog. It was too big- so apparently it runs a little big FYI. Otherwise it's good quality and super cute. I adore the bright blue color of it.

Easy to break up into training size chunks. My German Shepherd x Belgian Malinios loves This treats along with the clicker training!! I had tried other treats but couldn’t get her attention, these will probably be all I buy.

My dog is super picky. The only dog treat she likes are bully sticks. She doesn't even care for bacon flavored treats. She does like pure dehydrated chicken (which I cut and dehydrate at home for her but it's such a pain to do every week) so imagine my happiness when I found out she actually likes these treats! They smell just like any other dog treats but must taste amazing Lol

My puppy loves these, and will offer up loads of behaviors in order to score a piece of these. She's a large breed mix, and at 9 weeks old I cut each treat into 16 pieces (4x4) so they go a long way. This will be a regular purchase!

My wife says they stink.  I didn't notice they stunk until my wife mentioned it.  I was looking for something for clicker training, but these are too big.  They smell too fishy to spend time chopping them up.  One star off because they could be just as enjoyed by my dog without the strong fish smell.

review_title: The fact that they are also so good for him is a huge bonus
review_body: My puppy loves these! makes training a lot easier when he will do almost anything for one of these little treats. The fact that they are also so good for him is a huge bonus. He thinks he is getting puppy candy when he is actually getting a nutritious treat! Already ordered more so I have plenty on hand.

So,  does it have grains or not.. seems to be the question.  The bag doesn't show it,  yet the product description says brown rice flour and oatmeal.  Last time I checked,  those are grains.  My pup loved them,  but they give him horrible gas. Without knowing if they really are grain free or not,  I will not be ordering these again.

review_title: My puppy has been in perfect health until I introduced him to this puppy treats
review_body: In the beginning my 7 week old puppy loves this treat.  But as soon as he eats them he gets runny stool.  Even though I only give him one or two treats per day.  By the second day my puppy started to get very sick and threw up pieces of the wellness treats!! He threw up twice within the last 12 hours!  My puppy has been in perfect health until I introduced him to this puppy treats! Be careful!

review_title: Great treats. I purchased crunchy chicken & carrot
review_body: Great treats. I purchased crunchy chicken & carrot. Perfect size, no need to break into two. Does not cause watery stool on my puppy, which is easily done with other brands. High quality made. Two thumbs up to Wellness, they have a great reputation.

My 4 month old mini schnauzer puppy with razor sharp puppy teeth loves these! I cut the rings into quarters and they are the perfect distraction when she goes into her bite/chew mode. It takes her a long time to get through the chew, so she is occupied for about 10-15 minutes.

I got this along with the WELLNESS puppy core grain free canned food. These are soft treats and a little chewy for my young puppy. He does like them, but it takes him forever to chew it! i have to half the squares and give it to him like that. Overall, the ingredients are great, and they make great training treats.  Puppy has taken a liking to this as he takes it and goes into his hiding spot for few minutes to chew and savour in silence ;)

Perfectly fits my growing Australian Shepherd puppy. Nice and snug, doesn’t loosen up when she plays. Her mouthy sister who eats collars hasn’t been able to chew it off! We started out at the tightest setting on a small, she’s 4months old and we still have a ways to go. Very pleased. Will happily buy another, if she ever outgrows this one.

review_title: Great collar for a great price.
review_body: Love this collar. The price is great and my dog seems to like it. Feels durable and the color is very pretty.

Good quality and cheap collar. Fits perfectly. I ordered French Pink and it's a not quite as bright as the picture shows for that collar (more solid and slightly darker in pink color) but still looks good.

Bought this for my pup! Great product, durable, and comfortable for him! Didn’t like the “blueberry” logo where it is because of the size of my dogs neck, so it sits on the logo which was a little hard to finagle, but we made it work! Also, that has more to do with his neck than the actual collar. It hasn’t impacted the functionality of the collar, and I would definitely buy this product again!

review_title: The quality is good The label tiny
review_body: The quality is good

review_title: Great quality and color! Excellent customer service!!
review_body: Excellent quality collar!!! I love this dog collar for my boxer! Very durable and strong quality! I had her name and my husbands cell phone number printer on the collar in case our rebellious boxer gets loose! :)

love this product, love the color of this product & the general idea of a product like this is phenomenal. sometimes he detaches it, but i don’t know if it is just because he steps on the release button on the buckle with his big ole feet or if it is a flaw in the product. but i am happy with this product and this company. will repurchase.

These collars are amazing. I have two labradors that tend to chomp on each other‘s collars & these are the only collars that have upheld my crazy labradors.  I would definitely recommend them.  I have had them for over year and the colors do not fade and still look great.

review_title: No more dangling items from the caller. Good quality.
review_body: So glad my dog's name is embroidered on the collar. No more dangling items from her collar when every time she shook it clattered and also hit her. Her neck is nice and smooth now. Quality collar and beautiful embroidery.

Nice quality collar with a color selection not available in the local pet stores, but they run a little smaller than the sizing guide indicates.  A fully extended XS would have been exactly what my dog has now, but it came up 1/2" short.  The difference was between a nice fit and a tight fit.  I ordered several and had to return them all for the next size up.

review_title: Honestly they are great! The dogs love them and are eager to ...
review_body: Wish there were more in 1 bag as I have 2 puppies and full grown dog. Also wish (for that reason alone) they were a little cheaper. Honestly they are great! The dogs love them and are eager to please and earn a treat. I will definitely be ordering again!

Nice treats that my puppy loves! I use these especially for putting my puppy’s allergy tablet in. These are soft enough to mash a tablet into and my puppy doesn’t even know that he’s taking his medication. I have bought multiple types of treats and several of them, my puppy just doesn’t care for, but he gobbles these up!

My toy Yorkie will only eat these treats. She’s 14 years old and 3 lbs. I break one up into about 6 tiny pieces. She’s one of those picky eaters who turns up her nose at every other treat she’s ever been offered.

I just got this in today and gave one to my Bichon, he hated the smell and shook his head anytime he got close.  I have to give him credit he tried to eat it several times but everytime he tried the smell was so bad he would shake his head and back away.

review_title: which we like for our puppy
review_body: These treats are a hit with my puppy! We take them as training treats on walks, and just stick a few in our pockets before we leave. They don't leave a mess, they aren't smelly, and they're grain-free, which we like for our puppy.

The pups enjoy these and all other Wellness treats.  My vet highly recommended a grain free regimen from the beginning.  Hopefully with Wellness treats and products with glucose/chondroitin, we're off to a long and healthy life.
Should've read the reviews.  Gave my puppy diarrhea.

review_title: Dog approved and healthy ingredient list.
review_body: When we got a new puppy we bought about 5 different treats for him to test out.  Some he turned his nose up at.  Some he went bananas for.  I would say these were his second favorite only to one that was mad of 100% duck and very pricey.  These are softer than most which I think he liked too.  I also like that they are soft flat squares that I could tear in half to get more training incentives out of them without over feeding him when he was smaller.  Will repurchase and keep in the rotation.  Dog approved and great healthy ingredient list.
We have a super picky puppy who hates any hard treats. I like these because they’re healthy for her, but also able to break them into smaller pieces for training. Highly recommend.

Love this brand!! I use these (and other Wellness treats) for training rewards. I'm also changing my beagle puppy's food to this brand (she started on Purina Pro Plan sport). My pup has no problems at all with digestion while eating these. Nice solid poops, yay! :)

review_title: Great collar for my Boston Terrier pup
review_body: This collar was exactly what I was expecting and has lasted a very long time. The only reason I got a new collar was because my dog outgrew this one. If you're looking for a simple but cute collar for your dog, I would recommend this collar. My dog chewed on it a few times when it was off of her and was constantly rolling around in the grass/mud with it on, and even with that the durability lasted through all of that.

So I bought this lovely teal colour because I love teal!!! It was too big for my dog, which was perhaps my fault... I swore he was a size medium but obviously he must be a small. So the collar doesn't actually fit but it sure looks pretty. So three stars for looking pretty and appearing as if it would have been a GREAT collar!

review_title: The loop for leash attachment is great, even my clumsy hands can find it through ...
review_body: Much sturdier than I expected and bright enough to be seen even on a black pomeranian hairball. The loop for leash attachment is great, even my clumsy hands can find it through all the dog hair on an excited puppy.
Not a true “fluorescent orange” slightly coral, my dog looks a little fender confused but seems well made.
Good dog collar. I liked it, it is well manufactured, it's strong enough. Nice colors. I'm satisfied with this product. I bought the purple color for my black lab-pit mix female dog.

This collar is very well-made. I bought it for my miniature schnauzer. It is perfect! I love all of the color choices. They stay bright and colorful for a long time! I think this is a quality product that will last a long time.

review_title: Really great collar, except it was almost too small
review_body: Really great collar, except it was almost too small. I read a few reviews that said it ran large but after measuring the one I ordered I realized it runs small. Just be careful to measure your dogs current collar and compare to this one. It's great quality and looks as though it will hold up over time!
I bought the collar, leash and harness. I love the color so rich and very well made. My bulldog looks beautiful in this purple. I plan on buying other colors. I just wish the leashes were longer.

I loved the idea of this, but once I got the collars and adjusted them to fit my dogs necks you could no longer see the phone number/contact info. It was stuck underneath the adjuster. I ended up throwing them both in the garbage.

review_title: No more trying to sit in my lap!
review_body: I love this seat belt. I bought a collar from this company before and loved the material it was made from. it's durable for my dog and the stitching is great. the only thing I don't like about the seat belt is how short it is. I wish it was just a little longer so my puppy could put his head out the window! I would recommend this product for anyone who's worried about their pets safety when driving! its less stressful driving now that I know my dog is secured.

review_title: My pup loves these treats. They appear healthy and ...
review_body: My pup loves these treats. They appear healthy and do not upset my baby’s stomach. The package is not full but I make up for that by breaking up the soft treats so one can really be 6-8 small pieces. Of course I have small 6lbs pup that by im training so that works. If you have a bigger dog these treats will run out fast on you.

review_title: ... been training our almost 12 week old lab mix pretty intensly (several times a day with each session lasting ...
review_body: We have been training our almost 12 week old lab mix pretty intensly (several times a day with each session lasting 5-10 minutes) the past few weeks and the Wellness Soft Puppy Bites are our go to for the reward treat. He thinks training is a game and he loves the "prize"! I especially love that these treats are grain-free and so healthy for him. A little tip to make these "training treats" last much longer: these come in squares, so we cut the squares into ninths. definitely a good size to use as small, quick rewards for an obeyed command. Our little guy has been training with us for 2 weeks and he already knows "sit", "come", "quiet", "wait" and is in the middle of learning "down". He is a smart little guy, but I swear that these treats are 50% responsible! Haha! A side note: I also bought the non puppy Wellness Soft Wellbites and they are the exact same, just in a bigger bag and the treats are slightly bigger, and the ingredients are the same.

Our new puppy is being trained to go on indoor pads. These are the best reward for him.  He loves them  And, they are the right size for his mount. He is a small dog, Shih Tzu and larger treats are just too big.  I like the fact that they are grain free.  Apparently so does he.

review_title: Ramona the french bulldog puppy approves!
review_body: So we just got a French bulldog puppy and we have started the fun and long puppy training process. Anyone who knows bull dog breeds understands that you have to be careful with their diet as they tend to have allergy and skin problems. So we researched and bought this brand based on the ingredients, no corn fillers etc.  However, when I opened up the package and gave her this treat she gulped it down and eagerly and started sniffing around for more. So when I brought it back out later she started dancing and twirling around like a little circus dog. I was very surprised to see our usually laid-back little lazy puppy display so much excitement over a little treat. From then on it has been her favorite treat and we have been using it exclusively for potty training and sitting commands. She has come to know the yellow color of the package every time we bring it out then lazy little Ramona gets up and starts dancing around sniffing the air displaying an unusual amount of excitement for her beloved treat. As her human owner, I will remark that the treats do have a sort of smokey appealing smell at least for a doggy treat. So overall, I must say, from Ramona to all to out there she recommends this treat for old and young dogs and for even bulldogs sensitive diets.

review_title: Our little guy LOVES THESE TREATS
review_body: Our boy LOVES these treats!!!! They are his "high value" treats because they're soft and super flavored - we can get him to drop things with these! ;) Would definitely recommend. We keep buying more!

review_title: They are very soft so it's easy to break them into tiny pieces
review_body: My puppy loves these! I use them for training treats. They are very soft so it's easy to break them into tiny pieces. I don't want to fill him up on only treats, so I like that I can get up to about 6-8 small bits out of one treat to give him after he does his tricks.

My dog loves these. I use just liver treats for my go to training treat and break out these for an extra special reward. He actually got into the bathtub on his own with these!!! He also has tunnel vision for dogs and squirrels on walks, and these are the only things that can lure him away. I can't recommend these enough.

review_title: Great as a special incentive treat.
review_body: My pup enjoys them quite a bit, I used them as a moderately high reward, second only to actual meat products. I have noticed they can cause slightly softer stool. The treats are very moist though and I don't think it's necessarily a bad or unusual thing, just need to be mindful you're not giving too much of this treat.

Great, soft training treats! I didn't realize how great these were until I tried a different brand. I need to reorder these because they're much softer and seem to have a better taste than the science diet ones I recently purchased.

review_title: These are great. Our puppy wasn't interested in any of the ...
review_body: These are great. Our puppy wasn't interested in any of the treats we bought and we were starting obedience classes (which insisted I bring some treats as rewards) so I ordered a small variety, and these have been a hit. Perfect size for training as well.

The collar is a good strong product. The only Issue I have with it is that my husky puppy is too big for the small at 11 weeks old but the medium cannot be tightened quite enough for her to wear safely with the logo placed where it is. Maybe in a couple more weeks.  It is cute on her though.
I bought the large for my dog who has a 20 inch neck. Too big even when tightened to the max. I like the materials, but just too big. Will give it to the neighbor with a larger dog.

review_title: Nice, but our dog can slip out of it.
review_body: This is a nice looking collar.  Easy to put on and take off for baths.  One BIG problem that we've had is that our dog can slip out of it when she is not being cooperative.  I tighten it as far as it goes (label in the way) and it always slips back about 1/2 inch.  It becomes loose enough for our dog to slip out of.

review_title: Looks good, easy on and off
review_body: Good look, easy on and off. Did slip off dogs head on a walk. Went back to a choke chain. Did keep this collar on for his tags. Think it would be great for smaller dogs not trying to get out of a collar.

review_title: Love the collar and the color.
review_body: We have a sable sheltie and the color suits him
Lable of product is way too bulky and in an awkward place. I couldn't not resize it.

Color stands out for my Boston Bull Terrier, well made! Bought these collars/leash in the past and didn't realize I could throw in the washer, they come out looking like new. Highly recommend Collars/ Leash from Blueberry!! thank you!

I have a 65lb dog, I love this collar. He has thick fur around the neck and this collar doesn't displace it. He looks awesome. However, it is not a collar I would trust for a dog that pulls on a leash if you're using this rather than a harness, purely because it is not super thick. I've also washed it a couple times and it has not lost its brightness.

review_title: Excellent value. Good quality material that does not fade ...
review_body: Excellent value.  Good quality material that does not fade or stain. The clip is sturdy and secures easily around my pup's neck.  It holds up well in the wash, too.
Just adopted a yellow lab and had to replace basically everything from our smaller pup that we had.  Great price point, and so far so good on the clasp and leash holder.

Good thick collar. Item is just as described. I bought the small, and my dog was 45 pounds when he was on the very edge of that size, so we upgraded him to a medium. I like the color, its a very rich blue. Its a thick material, and there's not many comparable collars for the price. Absolutely perfect

review_title: Pet will not stand behind there products
review_body: I bought this collar about 7 months ago it started to fray, after 7 several emails back and forth they said it looked like rubbed on something sharp, I know this did not happen but at close examination you can see it was not sewn properly, [see attached pic] they would be willing to give me 50% off if I order a new one through there web sight. Evidently Blueberry Pet will not stand behind there products!

Great first collar for our puppy. She didn't mind it one bit from the first day we got her. Very easy to clip on and off. We have a harness to, but don't use it all the time as it's a little bulky and probably got for her in the summer.
I didn't know you couldn't put these in a Volvo until it was too late. In my p finances Dodge, she can step on it and step right out of the seatbelt. I immediately switched designs.

Beware.  This collar is not properly designed.  Even with the collar adjusted properly there is too much slack in the loop that tightens the collar around the neck when pulled.  As a result if the collar is left on an unattended dog there is a good possibility the dog will be able to slip this loop into his mouth which could cause significant harm or worse.  I would look for a better designed martingale with a shorter loop.

review_title: Love this, although it took more than a week ...
review_body: Love this, although it took more than a week to get the blueberry.  The size is hard to find in the 5/8th inch.  I had to look and look for a fit up to 16 inches.  Most of the 5/8th inch collars only go up to 14 inches total, and my pups have 14 inch necks. That is too close for comfort.  They don't have any sharp edges to irritate the skin, either.
Super cute, high quality, make sure you measure and order the right size.  We ordered a size too big and though we were able to adjust the collar the phone number is now in a wonky spot.
Great collar. Got one in yellow for our rescue dog and came back for another for his big brother. Color is very vibrant, collar is very sturdy, well made. Highly recommend.
This seatbelt is lovely and would work perfectly for a smaller dog.  It did not, however, work so well for my 53 lb hound mix.  We opted for a longer seatbelt.
The medium will fit a Saint Bernard but there won't be much wiggle room between the collar and their neck at its maximum length. Go for a large if you have a large breed.

Quality product, locally manufactured. Our puppy loves these, perfect soft consistency for little teething mouths. The smell is not offensive & they aren't loaded with junk. I appreciate the resealable bag. Happy with our purchase!
My pup loves the soft puppy bites. I am so happy that I can order them from Amazon.com There are times when my local pet store does not have them. The bites come in different flavors.

review_title: A little too big for tiny mouths.
review_body: These puppy bites are 1" squares and are too small for tiny (toy) dog puppies to chew, each bite has to be cut into at least four pieces, if not six, for tiny puppy mouths. Our puppy likes them but doesn't love them, and they're too stiff to fit inside the smallest Kong and still be fished out by a puppy.

review_title: Our golden retriever puppy loves these as treats for training ...
review_body: Our golden retriever puppy loves these as treats for training and to incentivize peeing/pooping outside. We cut them in half or even thirds to make them last longer. Otherwise we go through a pack in about a week. Wish there were more in each pack, but we'll continue to stick with these as they do the job.

review_title: My dogs love these. I use these to put in the ...
review_body: My dogs love these. I use these to put in the Trixie activity boards. Other treats just didn't keep them intrigued with trying to figure how to open the drawers for Trixie games. These treats sure kept them sniffing wanting to get that reward.  These were also great when I had to give my one dog his medication since he got his ears, tail and duclaws done.  The medication slid right in.
the pup we had did not enjoy these, he always spat them out and one time they made him throw up... they landed in the trash shortly after...

10 month old puppy loves this treat.  They have a pretty strong smell so he immediately knows when I open the bag and is eager to practice commands.  I also like the size and texture since they easily fit into activity toys that keep him busy for awhile.
These are great treats- they are a good size for puppies, they are soft (which I really like- easier for my puppy to chew them), and my puppy seems to love them!

review_title: Great treats! Our puppy's favorite trainers.
review_body: Our 7 month-old Schnoodle pup LOVES these and is only too happy to sit and lie down and stay and come if she knows these are the reward! The ingredients are natural and they're super easy to cut into smaller pieces (we actually divide them into quarters) so we get way more bang for the buck! Highly recommend!

review_title: My dog loves these! It was my first time ...
review_body: My dog loves these!  It was my first time trying them as we feed him wellness food so why not the treats.  They arrived quickly and every time I pick up the bag my dog sits with his tail wagging.  I already bought more :)

review_title: I LOVE these blueberry pet collars and leashes
review_body: I LOVE these blueberry pet collars and leashes! They're very, very well made and are priced wonderfully. I bought the bright pink collar and leash for my 50 pound dog and a medium fit perfectly. They're strong and sturdy, and the color is great. Plus they make a huge variety of adorable prints. I'm a customer for life!
While this said for 12 - 16" neck, when I received collar for my dogs 13" neck the embroidery was lost in the buckle. Other than that I love the collar

We ordered the light lavender colored collar for our new puppy. She is a blue weim and the color looks perfect on her! She gets so many compliments about how good it looks against her coloring. The collar itself is well made and expands quite a bit, making it perfect for our ever-growing puppy. It came quickly and well packaged.
Works great, well-made, and durable.  Wish the hubby had bought it in red for our yellow lab, however.  But that's on him. :)

review_title: One of the best collars I've used for my dogs
review_body: Fits true to size and is a nice thick quality. But not too heavy. My golden retriever is sensitive to collars. He likes to be "naked". But when I put this one on him, he didn't mind too much and quickly got used it it. The clip is super easy to use but is sturdy so it won't come off randomly while walking the dog. Good product, good price!

review_title: They are the perfect light weight collar for our mostly indoor pups
review_body: They are the perfect light weight collar for our mostly indoor pups. Love seeing their names on the color and easy to see phone # in case they get lost. The dogs are chipped as well, but the collar will provide quicker call and return home.

review_title: so at first i thought i got a great deal because if you look at walmart or other ...
review_body: so at first i thought i got a great deal because if you look at walmart or other cheap stores the price is relatively good.  however, i was walking through a grocery store and looked at the pet section, not expecting anything worthwhile.  however, to my surprise, i found a very similar product, almost identical.  the only difference was it didnt have the blueberry logo.  The price difference was $5....  i felt both in my hand.  I'm confident that the materials are identical by feel and look.
Really great collar. I got each of my dogs one of these. The buckles are very well made. The nylon isn't scratchy or rough. The colors are bright. The price is right. I really like this brand.
What a strong, durable, brightly colored color! We got bright yellow for our black Doberman (size medium). Looks great, feels great, and is super durable. Highly recommended!

review_title: The light pink is not at all like the photo
review_body: The light pink is not at all like the photo! I’m posting a pic of the matching leash just to show the color. I purchased the lightest color pink. Kept it because it looks cute on my dog.

Soft little chew treats that we tried out with our puppy from 8-10 weeks old. Though they are soft and our pup liked them, they have a weird smell and gave our pup the smelliest gas. We've moved onto Rileys organics with no gas problems.

review_title: I love this treats for my puppy
review_body: I love this treats for my puppy. They are soft and he loves it. I usually buy it from Petsmart. When I saw the awesome price on Amazon, I decided to get two packages. When I opened the package, the smell was sooooo strong and it felt just slightly greasy. The ones I bought at Petsmart were not as strong smelling--actually did not really smell at all--and was little drier to the touch.

Our shichon LOVES these treats. He's about a year old now but we started with these treats when he was only about 3 months old and have subscribed to have them delivered monthly. They're soft and just the right size, maybe the size of a quarter or a bit smaller. Great for training.
When i first got them they were crunchy like milk bones, and now the are soft and maybe stale becuse our puppy doesnt like them as much as when we first got them.

We recently added to our family and got a little Bichon and so a potty training/house braking we went.  These worked perfectly.  Each little treat can be cut into 4 smaller treats and my puppy was housebroke in 2 months.  Pretty good for a Bichon.  No puppy pads or any of that for us.  We did it like the big dogs.  Every couple hours outside to potty and loads of praise and used this as a treat.  We wrote down a schedule so we never missed a potty time then just started to stretch it out.  Never did anything negative just used these treats.  Now they are used for sit, stand, down, come, dance and all the rest.  I think they are da'bomb and so does Indiana our puppy.

review_title: I love that these are grain free
review_body: I love that these are grain free.  They are soft enough, that my older dog can enjoy her treat, instead of having to crunch on a hard cookie.  They also  are soft enough, to where you can just tear them apart, into smaller pieces.  I am using these for training treats, and taking them with me to obedience classes.  My shepherds give them a 5 paw review.

These haven't been as satisfactory as I expected. They are small enough for immediate consumption, but they are sufficiently chewy to invite  a leisurely approach that disrupts training. Oddly, they haven't shown much appeal to dog either.

My puppy loves these.  I break each treat into 4 to 6 pieces.  The first ingredients are meat and Wellness includes calorie information.  I am careful not to feed my pup too many treats because these are "junk food."  That said, the smaller portions work well as a reward and also in 'trainer toys' that encourage my pup to work a little harder for pieces of kibble and treats.

Both puppies, (chihuahuah/wiener dog) and ( doberman/pitbull/shepard) love them. They are soft and easy to break into little pieces to for training. Puppies generally love all cookies, but I'm glad they enjoy a healthy cookie.

Great training treats!  My dog adores them.  Don't cause any stomach upset, either.  I was able to house train her using these.  You can even break them in half since they are so soft.  I'll always have some of these on hand - great product.
These colors are sturdy, bright colors and room to put contact information.  My dogs where these colors all the time. Clasp is good too. Love them

Love my dog's collar.  I put my name on the collar and phone number.  One should NOT ever put your pet's name on a collar because it makes it easier to keep a lost pet if the pet recognizes his/her name.
The small fits my bichon, but it does cover up some of the phone number.

review_title: wider one and he hated it and wold not stop itching
review_body: My new puppy loves this collar. I had a thicker, wider one and he hated it and wold not stop itching. With this one it is thin enough that he was used to it in one day. I can't wait to buy him his next one.
This little red collar is a perfect pop of color for my 3 month old black and white Morkie. Will purchase a larger size for him when needed.

review_title: ... collar with purple embroidery and the quality is very good. I have a boxer/ bulldog and I should ...
review_body: The colors are very vivid teal collar with purple embroidery and the quality is very good. I have a boxer/ bulldog and I should have gone with the medium but that’s on me, it’s fits fine but it seems to thick for her neck.  I would recommend this product.

review_title: Excellent new collar for my four legged friend
review_body: Excellent collar that looks like it does on screen, works perfectly, and fits as it should. A+. It also looks nice on my black dog with the blue/teal on him now. Thanks.

I was very happy when I received this product, I purchased the red brick collar, harness, and leash and the color advertised is just what I received! The color goes great with my brownish brindle American Bully pup!

I love this collar! It looks great on my white and black terrier mix girl! I ordered her a medium, and I have it as tight as it will go. I think I should have ordered a small; she’s 29 pounds. I will definitely recommend and order this collar again!

This collar has worked out perfectly for my dog. I've no issues at all. I ordered the same collar in the military green for my other dog. Both dogs play rough and will grab each other's collars and still look good with no damage. The price is very reasonable. Would buy again.
She really like these.

review_title: Healthy puppy treat, my dogs love!!
review_body: I have a 15 weeks old giant schnoodle puppy I bought these to use to work on his training. He absolutely loves them, they can be tore into smaller pieces so they last longer. He liked them so much that when we had our recent litter of puppies I bought more to use to work with the puppies as they got a little older. I also reccomend them to all the families who adopt puppies from me. I just wish I could get them in a larger size bag!

review_title: Treats are soft and easy to break up
review_body: My dog is really picky and sometimes he wants these and sometimes he doesn't. He likes them enough I can alternate them with other treats. I wanted something he woul really beg for to use for training.

My maltese-yorkie puppy loves these! No issues so far and she can't get enough. I do break them into 4ths since she's so tiny.  I also love that they're healthy and good for her. Will definitely be buying these again.

My 11.5 pound Brussels Griffon loves these.  Her breakfast is 5 of these.  You could easily use as a reward, but, Bria, my baby, is very picky about her food - she expects and enjoys these every morning.  Barbie

review_title: Super soft , easy to chew for puppies !
review_body: These are my puppy’s absolute favorite treats ! We have a little Shih Tzu puppy and these are perfect for training ! He absolutely loves them. Since he has tiny baby teeth these are super easy for him to chew as well. I love that they are soft and healthy for him as well ! I have already repurchased since my original order !
I will e looking for a bigger supply too. They love these things. Now I will have to ration them out to its full potential. I hope the old beagle Dranzer won't eat these. Yeah right.

review_title: Well, this product was not suited for my bichons ...
review_body: Well, this product was not suited for my bichons tummys.  It made their poop very soft. I will not reorder.

review_title: They have like cuts in them to make it into a smaller ...
review_body: My puppy loves these. They have like cuts in them to make it into a smaller training treat. I'm not sure of its because the cut didn't go all the way through or if it's an option to make the treat into a smaller square. Anyhow I rip them into smaller pieces and use them to train her.

review_title: They are great treats and training treats for my Mom's new puppy
review_body: They are great treats and training treats for my Mom's new puppy. They are not hard on his stomach and must taste great, because he is always  looking for more.

Wonderful collars! Very well made and quite soft. My pups like these very much (and one of them is quite picky about her collars). This is my second order after how impressed I was with the first one and I fully intend to order again the next time they need new ones.

review_title: I would wear this if I was a dog.
review_body: I s*** you not, this collar is the bombdiggity. Very tough and durable. Stylish, colors match the pictures. Very reasonable on price and you dont have to go through the pet store through their messy aisles trying to find something and then end up paying 15/16 bucks for it. This is totally worth it. Love it! I plan on getting more!

I love this color!! It looks great on my black lab. He is pretty big. He weighs about 98 pounds. I got the size large. It fits GREAT! With some room to spare. Seems to be pretry sturdy. My dog seems like he is some hot sh*t now with this new color.

Excellent collar! Has held up for my GSD puppy from 3-6 months and is still going, although we are going to have to size up pretty soon! All in all, I love the collar but have noticed that it faded and lost its color fairly quickly, which is a bit disappointing. Overall, great collar though!
Fits perfect.  I don’t hook the leash to the collar just have all his tags attached to it. Dust, dirt, food doesn’t get attach to it.  Recommended.

Disappointed with the color. I ordered "dark orchid". I thought the color was going to be a red/violet based on the image in the description and the color name "orchid". The color of the collar is more like "Crayola crayon" purple.  That is fine, but it is not what I thought I was ordering.
This was a gorgeous little collar for our 7 lb chihuahua. It was well built and easy to adjust. We got an extra small and fit him perfectly.

review_title: Very nice color, hasn't faded at all, plastic clasp better than some.  2 UPDATES POSTED
review_body: UPDATE # 2:  July 2015:  Hubby brought this pretty collar in the house to show me one Saturday afternoon.  He'd been mowing lawn, didn't see the neon green collar laying in the green grass and hit it with the mower.  Now, I have no idea how the collar got off the dog. Since it was pretty chewed up after going through the mower, I couldn't tell what happened for sure.  I'm assuming, though, that the buckle failed as the collar material itself is much too strong to break and I'm pretty sure it wasn't cut.  The other possibility is the locking slide moved, the collar size enlarged enough to slip over this dog's LARGE head.  Neither possibility is good.  A failing buckle is never good, a failing lock slide (that little plastic piece that is supposed to prevent the collar from changing size on its own) is even WORSE.  It's one thing to have the collar enlarge so it falls off.  It's quite another to have it shorten and choke your dog!  For this reason, I've changed my original 4 star rating to 3.

review_title: Well made and just slightly more narrow that other collars. Worked perfectly.
review_body: Perfect for my "mini-pin dachshund" neck. I needed at least 9 inches but needed slightly more narrow than he was currently wearing. This one worked perfectly.
Excellent dog collar- I did bought the large one which are too big for my Labs but still works and looks good.  I really like my phone number on them it gives me that added protection for them.

review_title: Great treats for a poodle puppy with a sensitive stomach
review_body: I have a standard poodle puppy with a very sensitive stomach. These treats do not get him gastrointestinal issues and they are tempting enough for him to use as a reward for training.

review_title: Makes my dog eat her own poop
review_body: My dog loves it. However, it has very strong garlic smell.  This garlic smell in my dog's poop makes her eat her own poop every chance she gets. She never shows any interest in eating her own poop except when I feed her this treat.

We are training 2 border collie puppies, and are trying lots of treats in the process.  These were well received, and I like the nutritional value plus the cost factor.  Would buy again, especially if on sale.

review_title: Both owner and puppy are satisfied!
review_body: Our pup loves all of the wellness treats.  I love that they are small and healthy, and she loves that she gets them more frequently because of their size.  A great buy!

review_title: I like that they are grain free cause my dog has ...
review_body: My dog is the pickiest dog in the world. He's the only dog I know who will spit out some treats. Some treats he likes half the time. He likes these all the time. I like that they are grain free cause my dog has some skin issues so I try to feed him grain free to see if that will solve them. Excellent company and excellent price (on Amazon)

review_title: Kind of mixed on this. They are two tiny ...
review_body: Kind of mixed on this.  They are two tiny to use for much beyond a puppy (or maybe a toy breed?) but they are VERY hard, so our pup was not able to do much with them.  We will try again when he is a little older.

review_title: But I feel comfortable with it because this is a well trusted brand
review_body: My puppy loves these. I cut each piece into fours because hes a tiny shih-tzu and doesn't need that much at once. I give him one every time he pees or poops outside and then when he listens when I say to go inside. I think he eats more of these than the actual dog food. But I feel comfortable with it because this is a well trusted brand.

review_title: Goldendoodle pup loves these. Great for training!
review_body: Our 9 week old goldendoodle puppy LOVES these treats!! We break them in half and have been using them for all types of training. He flips when he sees the bag!  I do wish they made them in a larger bag & wasn’t an add on.

review_title: It’s a super small bag for the price too
review_body: They smell a bit off but my dog likes them. He’s not really a puppy anymore, he’s about 2 years old by they’re really soft. The ones I got were almost crumbly. It’s a super small bag for the price too. Probably won’t order these again.

This is basically crack for puppies. Right when my puppy catches a whiff of these he immediately is ready to train. I use this specifically for training and they are highly motivating. I just have to be a little careful with how many I give to my pup on a daily bases since the treats are more similar to wet food than a crunchy biscuit, if I give him (3 month 20lb GSD) more than 5 a day, he gets the runs. Ingredients are great so I know they're not harming him. I love these treats. Most effective and healthy so far!

review_title: The collars were the perfect size for my Chihuahua and pitbull (small and large)
review_body: The collars were the perfect size for my Chihuahua and pitbull (small and large). Only thing that sucks is that the light colors get dirty really fast and it's hard to get them back to their original color.

I love the colors.  I always use 2 collars to let my little doxi out on her run.  I use a clasp through both collars  and I  attach the lead to the clasp.  I have always been afraid to use one collar because previous collars have opened up and fallen off while she's outside exploring.  The blueberry collars  have a very strong buckle and although  I still use 2 collars I'm sure the buckle is plenty strong enough and i trust it not to open. I have the yellow collar and the multi color and they are nice and bright.

This little collar fit our Goldendoodle puppy perfectly from 8 weeks until about 16 weeks.  It was easy to adjust as he grew and didn't seem to bother him at all.  We liked it so much I just ordered the next size up for him. I found the orange to be pretty true to how it appears on screen and as I said the fit was perfect.
This leash is perfect! True to color and size. One of my dogs has had his for several months and just bought our puppy one. Great buy!

review_title: I love the hot pink color from Blueberry
review_body: I love the hot pink color from Blueberry! They are durable and stay vibrant without getting dingy. We have two puppies that are 90lbs at 1yr old that LOVE mud and these collars look good as new after a quick wet wipe!

Super high quality collar. Got the brick red with yellow writing, you can very easily read the text and name from 10-15 ft away. The pup hates wearing a collar, but will get out of the fence. Having this collar gives me peace of mind knowing if someone/the pound we're to pick him up they could call me to bail him out/pay ransom.

I LOVE the quality, colors and workmanship of the Blueberry brand of pet products. I have purchased 3 collars, 3 leashes, 3 harnesses and 2 seat belt attachments for my dogs. All of the items have been of OUTSTANDING quality! I HIGHLY recommend all of their products! The prices can't be beat for this type of quality!

Got this for my border collie mix and it fits perfectly using the adjustable feature.  He is a medium sized (55-60 lb.) dog and the MEDIUM size collar fits well. The bright aqua color looks good with his black and tan fur; the clasp seems sturdy; the material the collar is made out of seems strong. Overall I am pleased with this product!

I am very happy with this collar. The custom lettering is very easily read. The only thing I was disappointed with was the time it took to receive the item. Its ships very slowly! It was almost a week and a half late according to the original delivery date.

review_title: Do NOT purchase for a cat.
review_body: The 1 star is bc they advertise this to be suitable for a cat. No. Nope. Nuh uh. It is much too large, and stiff for a cat. My fur-baby is about 10 lbs, which is considered an average weight for a healthy, larger framed cat. The collar itself seems to be well-made, sturdy and the embroidery wasn’t bad..... but since it is personalized, (he likes to sneak out once in a while) it is now a chew toy instead of a collar that will carry his microchipping info. BTW. This is the small!!

Bought these once and my puppy loved them, but the second time I noticed a littler after everytime I gave him one he would throw up. Not sure I just got a bad batch or what but I ended up throwing the bag out because those treats were the only common factor of him throwing up!

review_title: Just as good as the ones at the stores
review_body: Bought a pack of these from Petco and my puppy seemed to like them. Was hesitant on ordering online because of people saying that they received fakes or something that was different. I still had some left of the original package so when these arrived, I compared them. The package looks the same and the treats themselves look the same. My puppy eats them just as fast as the original one and it hasn't caused him and diarrhea. Will buy again.

review_title: My picky havanese pup does not like soft treats or anything peanut butter flavored
review_body: My picky havanese pup does not like soft treats or anything peanut butter flavored. We tried these and he LOVES them.  Great size for his little mouth. We use them for training treats as well, but they may be a TINY bit big for that! This is our second bag and we will continue to buy these for sure!

My pupplies love these!  Since my dogs are small I cut one of them into 4 pieces and they are doing so good with their training with these as incentive! They are soft and so are a real treat for a dog that only gets dry dog food.

My tiny Maltipoo loves these, he is 10 wks old & weighs less than 2 lbs. I cut these treats up into tiny pieces & he is highly motivated by them and has already learned several commands. I like the ingredients & the manufacturer so I feel good about rewarding him with treats that are good for him. I found these to be very economical through Amazon & even more so since I cut each treat into, on  average, 9 tiny pieces. I also like that if I run out of pre-cut treats I can easily tear tiny pieces off of the bigger treat.
My dog liked it, but unfortunately it made her stool soft. It took me a while to figure out what was causing her soft stool. When I stopped giving her these treats, her poop was back to normal.

review_title: I would have like to choose a replacement
review_body: This item has preservatives that can harm the puppy. Unfortunately it can not be returned as metioned in Amazon. Although, ingredients mention food products that are okay to feed the treat. the preservatives defeat the purpose. I cannot understand if the product states no artificial product, it has the synthetics in the treats. I would have like to choose a replacement. I purchase plenty of items via amazon throughout the year. Well my puppy will not injest this item. Its, so sad, because this is a product that is provided via USA.  displeased customer.
These are my absolute favorite treats for puppies. Tender enough to split for very small pieces or for them to nibble from your fingers. Pups loved the taste and they even smell good.

review_title: I'm a huge fan of them because I know I'm giving her a good, wholesome treat made with good ingredients
review_body: My puppy loves these. I'm a huge fan of them because I know I'm giving her a good, wholesome treat made with good ingredients.

review_title: Puppy's fav treats and no runs for her...
review_body: My labradoodle puppy (now 10 months) has loved these treats more than any other I tried, I think partly because of the softness. She actually has a super sensitive stomach and got diarrhea from 4 or 5 different food brands (eats natural balance now), but these give her no problems.  They smell good to her, but not terrible to me, which is also a win!
I have a Shih Tzu and I bought a size small. Fits perfectly, no complaints!

review_title: Blueberry Pet 8 Colors Classic Dog Collor
review_body: This is a great product. It's well made and our dog use them everyday. They are holding up well with everyday use. This Classic dog collar comes in 8 different colors so there is a color for your dog. Colors are exactly as in pictures. I'm happy with the product.

review_title: Durable and my dog seems to be comfortable wearing it around
review_body: Durable and my dog seems to be comfortable wearing it around. Not heavy duty collar which was what I was looking for. It's easy enough to be worn with man tag at all times. Will purchase again soon in another color.

Durable and the color is SUPPER vibrant. I got the orange one and it makes my dog stick out at the dog park which is a huge plus. The collar is also extremely durable and I will be buying from here again when puppy outgrows his current collar.

review_title: Perfect for a 5-6 pound Chihuahua. Go for it!
review_body: I adopted a 5 pound Chihuahua. This was the only collar that fit her, and I tried about 20. Her neck is small. Love this collar.

I love Blueberry Pet collars! I have three dogs of different sizes and the sizing charts are on target. They last even through the play fighting my boys do. I've never had to worry about them being pulled off because of the adjuster piece being too loose and sliding the collars loose. The fun bright colors are a plus!

This collar is so cute. We got an x small to fit our puppy and it fit well with more room to adjust later. We recommend this collar as it is good quality and well made. We will definitely buy more Blueberry collars for our pug in the future.

review_title: Size small fit fluffy pomeranian well
review_body: The small size in blue was so cute and fit my pomeranian very well. However if you have a pomeranian with short hair an XS might be better.
This is a great collar, especially for a growing puppy. Or even as a permanent one for your full grown dog.
This is a great affordable collar. It looks very nice on my dog. He a 75 lbs pit mix. It was easy to add tags too.

I've ordered MANY bags of these treats because my puppy LUV'S them!! And the good part is they're soft because my puppy is Sooooo tiny, he's a micro mini Pomeranian that's was only a pound and a half at 5 months and his teeth are Soooo tiny he can't chew anything so soft is perfect!! Now he is a year and just starting eating treats and I have to break them into four pieces for him but he gobbles these up! He's VERY picky about what he likes so these must be good....and they're holistic, so maybe that means they're healthier for him. The bag lasts a long time and it's definitely worth it for the price.

I was researching treats to use for training and for "good dogs" when they have been on the grooming table.  These are about 1/2 inch square and I break them in half (my dogs are small). The fact that they are grain free appealed because my pups have grain allergies.  I'll buy them again.
I was excited to use these trees to train my puppy. I have a puppy and a dog who will eat nearly anything. Neither of them could be lured to even try these treats. Not so treaty.
I have been using these treats for almost 2 years as reward treats. My Yorkie's love them. Can be broken in half so bag last twice as long.

Pup loves these, and I appreciate the ingredients.  Good product as far as I can tell.  I'm constantly searching for healthy pet products that I can trust after all the recalls in the past 10 years of pet food and treats.  I wish I could afford Wellness food for my pets!
My two little dogs, Pomeranian and Chi, both love these treats. They are ever so soft and can be broken into even smaller pieces. This was a good find. Thank you.

review_title: The only thing that I dislike about these treats though
review_body: My puppy enjoys these treats, this is the third time I’ve ordered them and I’ll order again soon. The only thing that I dislike about these treats though, is that there is  a small portion of them and they don’t last long with my puppy.

review_title: neat little rewards that dogs of all sizes love
review_body: these little treats are the perfect size for training any size dog, because for dogs, size doesn't matter! I have five dogs of various breeds and they love the taste.
Too crunchy for my small puppy.  I thought I ordered the soft bites from Wellness which he loves.  This was all my fault as clearly they state "crunchy"

I've been buying these since day one of having our mini dachshund puppy. He is in love with these! To make the product last longer, I break them into smaller pieces when I give them to him (about 1/4 of the treat each time he does something good - even 1/8 is sufficient for his size at 6lbs). They are super soft and have a yummy aroma.

I got this collar for my Shetland Sheep Dog puppy. It works well for her regarding size (s) and collar weight but the clasp is VERY difficult to connect and release. Neither myself or my 20 year-old granddaughter can do it or undo it without great difficulty which makes for an unhappy puppy.

review_title: It's beautiful!! I absolutely love the color - it's ...
review_body: UPDATE: This collar's color has not faded at all, still be beautiful bright blue. Still just as durable as when I purchased it, and am now considering another color. LOVE this collar :D
Great price, and I love the color and quality of this collar! I got the Med, Neon Green for our 36lb retriever mix.

review_title: Doesn’t get as small as you might need!!!!
review_body: Nice quality but the blueberry thick branding keeps it from getting small enough for my Terrier. He has pulled out of the collar twice so we had to throw it away. Their brand names limits how small you can make the collar. Very disappointed.

review_title: Great product delivered in no time
review_body: My pupper loves her new collar. The old one I had was blue and kinda worn so I decided to get her a bright purple one. This was really vibrant and looks so cute on her. I got it in no time and was really pleased with it overall. I only gave 4 stars because the designer tag was so huge and isn't something you can hide so she looks like a walking advertisement but aside that it's great.
Like the quality and fun color but don't get Purple and yellow. The yellow letters and phone number can hardly be seen against the purple background.
3 months after ordering and its frayed and a mess. I didn't even put it on my dog til February because hebwasnt big enough.  Bought 2 and both are already needing replaced.

review_title: Great collar. Name and phone number are easy to ...
review_body: Great collar. Name and phone number are easy to read. Would much rather have a collar like this than have to hear  the jingle of a dog tag all the time.
Love the color. I bought a small for my 10 pound, 8 week old husky puppy and it fits her well. As she grows I can extend the collar.

review_title: Good for a quick switch from Harness
review_body: We usually use harness during the week then switch to this collar for a casual - pee, poo walk.  Works just fine.

review_title: I'd love to return it because it was not inexpensive
review_body: This product does not agree with my dog's digestion system.  She is 7 months old.  It seemed too rich.  It totally changed her poop from soft but firm to too soft and almost runny.  I'd love to return it because it was not inexpensive.

I was looking for narrow treats and found those with many good reviews.. But when i gave them to my puppy he puked them back out within 5 minutes and only had 2.. Ate them in the evening and felt bad until noon the next day.. Very upsetting:(

review_title: Puppy LOVES them but they are WAY too big.
review_body: My puppy loves these!  She's finicky about treats so I'm glad I found them.  I wish they were smaller, especially for a puppy.  I cut each treat into 4, I'm trying to teach her tricks, not feed her a meal.
Our puppy golden retriever loves these. I like that they are soft and can be easily broken up into smaller pieces for training, which also helps them last longer in between having to buy new bags

My puppy loves these. She is a little picky with treats sometimes but never turns these down. Plus, they're healthy! I usually tear them in half because they're a little big for my 5 lb puppy. They're very soft and easy for her to eat.
Toby is a 8 week old Chorkie puppy so he is pretty tiny. I tear these into 4 pieces for him. Easy to tear. They are healthy treats and Toby loves them. Previous puppy loved them as well.

I purchased these because my puppy is in training class and once he got a taste of the trainer's treats (Wellness Brand), he began not listeninig to my commands because he no longer cared for my treats (Zuke's Brand). He began watching the trainer like a hawk and waiting for her to come around to him so he could get her treats. Needless to say, he followed her commands flawlessly. So now that I have these treats, he is much more apt to follow my commands. Will be purchasing again. Also, this was a deal compared to the price at the local pet store.

review_title: Puppy didn't like them as much as blue buffalo treats
review_body: These are all right. Puppy didn't like them as much as blue buffalo treats, and some other brands we have tried. You cannot easily break them and they have a tendency to crumble so not great for travel.

review_title: Dog loves them but she can only handle so many
review_body: My dog loves these but they gave her gas. If you give your dog too many be prepared for possible diarrhea or indigestion. They aren't the greatest treats for small dogs if you're using them for training.

My Doberman puppy just loves these! As soon as she sees the bag she sits and starts doing her best to get some of these treats. Bonus is they're healthy and don't have an overpowering smell out of the bag. You also get quite a lot for the size of the bag and the price on Amazon makes it worth it. We use in conjunction with Wellness wet food and Large Breed Puppy food.
Maya's new collar looks and fit great! I swear she knows, she is even more beautiful in her new collar. Well constructed and easy fitting makes this a great buy!

review_title: The pink is a little brighter (hot pink) in real life - looks nice!
review_body: Got the french pink collar in medium for my 60 lb pit as her daycare requires a quick release collar while she's there. Fits perfectly, she has an 18" neck and the medium (fitting up to 20") seems to fit true to size. I was initially debating between the M and the L, but prefer the 3/4" width over the 1". The pink is a little brighter (hot pink) in real life - looks nice!

Just received this collar and love it but need to order a size smaller. I have a goldendoodle with pretty thick hair so I ordered a large and it's a little big. He could slip out of it if he tried. And it would definitely be too big after he's groomed.  He's about 65lbs. I will be ordering a medium for him.

review_title: Really nicely made. I wish I had orderd the smaller ...
review_body: Really nicely made. I wish I had orderd the smaller size for my 35 lb dog. It would have looked nicer. The quality is good...would recommend to others, and would also order again.

GREAT QUALITY, VERY DURABLE, BRIGHLY COLORED, QUAULITY EMBROIDERY. JUST BE MINDFUL OF LETTERING SPACING & PLACEMENT. I RECOMMEND PUTTING YOUR PETS NAME ONLY ON THE COLLER & CONTACT INFO ON AN ENGRAVED TAG.

review_title: Cute but randomly broke after 4 months
review_body: This collar is a pretty & vibrant color in person and seems well made/has not frayed. My puppy wore it for 4 months before it broke to where the plastic clasp will not unhook when pressing both sides inward. This is not a break that I or my dog could have caused.
We started out with the smaller puppy size and have now moved up to full size. Easy to size around his neck. Easy but secure on and off. Looks good too on our white 65 lb goldendoodle
It's an OK collar. The description is not accurate, larger than expected.

review_title: In this case it works great. Good product
review_body: We have purchased others and the "buckles" don't work very well. In this case it works great. Good product.

review_title: Gunther, The Pit Bull/Shar Pei Mix
review_body: Tough and worry free. Fits my dog perfectly and I have no worries of him getting off leash due to the collar breaking.

review_title: my puppy is a bit picky about treats but loves ...
review_body: my puppy is a bit picky about treats but loves these.  However, they make him totally crazy and out of control. I tested 3 different times to make sure I was correct that it was the treats.  He gets very hyper and bitey after having these.

I was hesitant about buying these based on some other reviews I had read, and my fears were confirmed when I took the brand new treat out of the bag and offered it to my little pup.  He sniffed it a few times, looked at it strangely, and refused to eat it.  Thinking he might just need some time to sniff them out first, I put a few in his food bowl.  He promptly tipped the bowl over to remove the treats and left them lying on the floor.  These were a major disappointment.
These are light and crunchy and delicious! My fur babies ate them right up!

review_title: Surprised how much my puppy loves it!
review_body: I use this for training now, my yorkie LOVES it compared to all of the other treats I have tried from Petsmart. I was surprised how much he liked it since I have never given him salmon or lamb before. My only regret was not getting the big pack because now I have to order more haha.

My favorite thing about these treats is that they are soft! Perfect for puppy so that he can eat them without choking on them or hurting his gums. I fit them in the puppy kong and a few other interactive treat toys and my puppy always goes to this treat even though they're pretty big for his tiny Corgi body. I break them up (which is super easy because of their softness). It is an excellent training treat if you're not giving them whole to a small dog.
Our 7 week old lab puppy loves these treats! We’re  use them to potty train her and as soon as she goes outside she comes running for a treat! We cut them into 4’s and they are perfect!
My pug likes but give her diaria

review_title: My 1 pound 8 ounce Yorkie loves these
review_body: I bought two other brands and she would not eat them. I use these for house training and rewards. I break them down smaller. Now I shake the bag and she dances for them.

review_title: These arrived in good time. Very great product to use for training ...
review_body: These arrived in good time. Very great product to use for training your new puppy. My dog was tiny when we got her and could barely chew on anything. We used these to pull off small pieces and feed them to her while teaching her basic commands. She really loved them, and were a favorite for a while.

Made my new puppy super sick with the runs so bad. He also had super bad gas. I only gave him two one day and that night he was paying for it. Since not giving him any he has been just fine. Super disappointed!

review_title: It is nice looking but it didn't last
review_body: After a month of constantly tightening this color for my small dog, the clasp broke. It is nice looking but it didn't last.
Love these Bluberry Pet products - we have collar, leash and step-in harness combos for each of our three Labs!
Happy with this product.  It seems strong and durable. The letters/numbers are bold and clearly visible. Sizing was correct as listed. It arrived quickly.

review_title: ... collar for my 3-month old puppy and it was perfect. Still a bit big
review_body: I bought a small purple collar for my 3-month old puppy and it was perfect. Still a bit big, even when at the smallest size, but this is perfect since my puppy is growing fast. This collar doesn't seem to bother my puppy at all, and I was even able to add a name tag with no problem. This is a thick width collar, so if you are looking for something thinner than I suggest that you look somewhere else.
This collar is adjustable. Fits the neck of my pomchi perfectly. I ordered the matching leash and the colors are true to the website. Cute and affordable.
awesome color, wish it was a little thicker and that the blueberry label wasn't so large but love it other than that
My Boxer somehow manages to get out of most collars and then chews them up.  This one has lasted him quite a while!!  I love it!

review_title: and it's beautiful! The collar itself appears to be well made
review_body: The color is exactly as pictured in the listing, and it's beautiful!  The collar itself appears to be well made.  Very glad I decided to go with a Blueberry collar!
I bought this for my dachshund size small: neck 12"-16", width 5/8. The collar fits perfectly, you can adjust the length if you feel that it's too tight.
Got an XS for my cat and fits great. Looks shape on her as well🙂

My older Boston Terrier loves these! He loves that they're soft, and they've got good flavor. He spit out another brand of treat after trying these because they weren't these, which is about as close as I can get to a verbatim review from him. :) When he's happy, I'm happy.

review_title: They dry out way to quickly even in the "zipper" ...
review_body: They dry out way to quickly even in the "zipper" bag. Tried them as bait in the show ring and my dog did not care one bit to have one. Made showing her a little rough without bait.

My dogs love these as training treats.  For my small dogs, 6.5 & 9 lbs I break these in halves or quarters when using for training as they are quite large. The dogs must like them because they come running as soon as they hear the bag - and these are dogs that snub their noses and most treats.

review_title: Nice and soft for the lil guy.
review_body: Used these as the first training aid and lil treats for the pup before getting him on the real stuff. Nice and soft he really liked them till he got real chicken.

My little Grand puppy took right to these treats, so evidentially they taste good. He is only 6 weeks old, so we just broke off a couple of really small pieces and gave to him, and he chewed and chewed and chewed, and come back wanting more, but he will have to grow a little more first,  before he gets bigger pieces. Thanks for a soft treat that a new puppy can actually eat and enjoy !!
I had a hard time finding treats especially design for puppies. This product is perfect! My pup love them for rewards and they are small enough to use as training treats too.
My dog would not touch these treats. It is the first time he has refused a treat. They smell pretty bad to me and apparently to him as well
My beagle has been getting these since she was a puppy and loves them. She knows which boxes have them inside because she barks extra loud to alert us they've been delivered.

review_title: I still buy them for him because they are hands down still his favorite, and we’ve tried a lot of different treats
review_body: Starting buying these when my dog was a puppy, I broke them into smaller pieces to use as training treats. I still buy them for him because they are hands down still his favorite, and we’ve tried a lot of different treats
These are nice small treats. And as I have a small puppy...they cut into half......WITHOUT crumbling. GREAT for training rewards without over feeding your pup!!!!
It's very small. I returned the first one for a larger size but I don't think the width is wide enough and it doesn't seem sturdy .

Got this collar for my puppy and got the extra small size and she’s a teddy bear (shitzu and bichon mix) and about 4 pounds. This collar was so perfect and when she grows up and needs a bigger size I’ll order again! And they have the cutest colors! 12/10 recommend!

review_title: Good quality and Nice Stitching Stays Integrated
review_body: Well made and great color.  The stitching is carefully done and the rubber logo is nice and small.  I love the color and my puppy likes the collar too.
Bought in February, lasted till July.  The clasp got stuck.  Don't tie him out, not sure what happened.

review_title: ... was for one of my dogs and I felt bad my other one didn't have a nicer collar
review_body: This is the second one buy from Blueberry the first was for one of my dogs and I felt bad my other one didn't have a nicer collar. It is great quality and doesn't stretch out easily. This one is for my bichon-shih tzu mix and fits hit very nicely.
Love the color options. This collar is thick and nicely made. Our lab has worn this 24/7 for 3 months now with zero snags, unravelling, etc.

I was searching for a new collar for my golden after she managed to get out of her old one and chew it up.  I am always a little skeptical to buy something online that needs to be sized, but it turned out pretty awesome!  It's a little big on her at the moment, but probably because she recently got a hair cut.  I got the bright pink one and LOVE IT!  I currently have a second one in my cart for my Aussie!  Going to be buying my girls matching ones for Christmas!!
Nice color, sturdy, no smell (other cheap leashes and collars Ive found have a chemical smell). Simple and delivers no problem. What else from an affordable collar?
High quality nice looking. I ordered the matching harness and it's just great. Highly recommended.

review_title: They are nice and soft so easily breakable for training purposes
